title: HemaVeda - Ayurvedic Healing for Happy and Healthy Life - Crystal Lake, IL
description: Specialties: We at HemaVeda specialize in authentic Ayurveda services and detox therapies. We also guide and help in healthy diet recipes for your well-being and health. Established in 2017. HemaVeda is based on a lineage of Ayurveda Medicine which is one of the oldest medicines recognized by human kind. The owner at HemaVeda Dr Swati M, comes from an Indian Ayurvedic lineage with generations of Ayurvedic Knowledge and Wisdom. She is practicing and experienced in Ayurevdic knowledge for 15 years now.
